title: Delta Children Chair Desk with Storage Bin, Disney Princess
description: This Disney Princess Chair Desk with Storage Bin by Delta Children offers kids the perfect spot for snack time, crafts, playtime or homework. This smart and sturdy chair with colorful graphics of Ariel, Jasmine, Belle, Moana and Rapunzel also features a built-in cup holder to hold markers, plus a fabric storage bin underneath for additional art supplies or toys. Perfectly sized, this durable chair and desk combo has a large work surface and low height that makes it easy for preschool kids and toddlers to get in and out on their own. About Disney Princesses: From royal castles to happily ever after, the Disney Princesses evoke the stories girls love to dream about. Belle, Ariel and Cinderella are just a few of the famous princess depicted on the Princess-inspired chairs, beds, toy storage and more from Delta Children.
